name: Violet M. CAVANAGH v. Robert D. CAVANAGH

judges: BEVILACQUA, C. J., and DORIS, J., did not participate.
parties: Violet M. CAVANAGH v. Robert D. CAVANAGH.

opinions.text:
ORDER
This appeal having been dismissed, the respondent’s motion for a briefing extension is hereby denied. This denial is without prejudice, however, to respondent’s filing a motion to reinstate his appeal.
BEVILACQUA, C. J., and DORIS, J., did not participate.

attorneys: John H. Hines, Jr., Providence, for petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
Violet M. CAVANAGH v. Robert D. CAVANAGH.
No. 79-17-A.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
Sept. 11, 1980.
John H. Hines, Jr., Providence, for petitioner.
Robert D. Cavanagh, pro se.
